AssumeRole.document: This API is used to request for the temporary security credentials of a role.
AssumeRole.name: Requests for the temporary security credentials of a role.

AssumeRoleWithSAML.document: This API is used to request for the temporary credentials for a role that has been authenticated via a SAML assertion.
AssumeRoleWithSAML.name: Requests for the temporary credentials for a role that has been authenticated via a SAML assertion

AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity.document: This API is used to apply for an OIDC role credential.
AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity.name: Applies for an OIDC role credential

GetCallerIdentity.document:
This API is used to get the identity information of the current caller.
The persistent keys of the root account and sub-account as well as the temporary credentials generated by `AssumeRole` and `GetFederationToken` can be used to get the identity information.
GetCallerIdentity.name: Gets the identity information of the current caller

GetFederationToken.document: This API is used to get temporary credentials for a federated user.
GetFederationToken.name: Gets temporary credentials for federated user

members.document:
Resource descriptions of a role, which can be obtained by clicking the role name in the [CAM console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role).
General role:
qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/4611686018427397919, qcs::cam::uin/12345678:roleName/testRoleName
Service role:
qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/tencentcloudServiceRole/4611686018427397920, qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/tencentcloudServiceRoleName/testServiceRoleName
members.name: RoleArn

members.document:
User-defined temporary session name.
It can contain 2-128 letters, digits, and symbols (=,.@_-). Regex: [\w+=,.@_-]*
members.name: RoleSessionName

members.document: Specifies the validity period of credentials in seconds. Default value: 7200. Maximum value: 43200
members.name: DurationSeconds

members.document:
Policy description
Note:
1. The policy needs to be URL-encoded (if you request a TencentCloud API through the GET method, all parameters must be URL-encoded again in accordance with [Signature v3](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/598/33159?from_cn_redirect=1#1.-.E6.8B.BC.E6.8E.A5.E8.A7.84.E8.8C.83.E8.AF.B7.E6.B1.82.E4.B8.B2) before the request is sent).
2. For the policy syntax, please see CAM's [Syntax Logic](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/10603?from_cn_redirect=1).
3. The policy cannot contain the `principal` element.
members.name: Policy

members.document:
External role ID, which can be obtained by clicking the role name in the [CAM console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role).
It can contain 2-128 letters, digits, and symbols (=,.@:/-). Regex: [\w+=,.@:\/-]*
members.name: ExternalId

members.document: List of session tags. Up to 50 tags are allowed. The tag keys can not duplicate.
members.name: Tags

members.document: UIN of the initiator
members.name: SourceIdentity

members.document: Temporary security credentials
members.name: Credentials

members.document: Credentials expiration time. A Unix timestamp will be returned which is accurate to the second
members.name: ExpiredTime

members.document: Credentials expiration time in UTC time in ISO 8601 format.
members.name: Expiration

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Base64-encoded SAML assertion
members.name: SAMLAssertion

members.document: Principal access description name
members.name: PrincipalArn

members.document: Role access description name
members.name: RoleArn

members.document: Session name
members.name: RoleSessionName

members.document: The validity period of the temporary credentials in seconds. Default value: 7,200s. Maximum value: 43,200s.
members.name: DurationSeconds

members.document: An object consists of the `Token`, `TmpSecretId`, and `TmpSecretId`
members.name: Credentials

members.document: Credentials expiration time. A Unix timestamp will be returned which is accurate to the second
members.name: ExpiredTime

members.document: Credentials expiration time in UTC time in ISO 8601 format.
members.name: Expiration

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Identity provider name
members.name: ProviderId

members.document: OIDC token issued by the IdP
members.name: WebIdentityToken

members.document: Role access description name
members.name: RoleArn

members.document: Session name
members.name: RoleSessionName

members.document: The validity period of the temporary credential in seconds. Default value: 7,200s. Maximum value: 43,200s.
members.name: DurationSeconds

members.document: Expiration time of the temporary credential (timestamp)
members.name: ExpiredTime

members.document: Expiration time of the temporary credential
members.name: Expiration

members.document: Temporary credential
members.name: Credentials

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Token, which contains up to 4,096 bytes depending on the associated policies.
members.name: Token

members.document: Temporary credentials key ID, which contains up to 1,024 bytes.
members.name: TmpSecretId

members.document: Temporary credentials key, which contains up to 1,024 bytes.
members.name: TmpSecretKey

members.document: ARN of the current caller.
members.name: Arn

members.document: Root account UIN of the current caller.
members.name: AccountId

members.document:
User ID.
1. If the caller is a Tencent Cloud account, the UIN of the current account is returned.
2. If the caller is a role, `roleId:roleSessionName` is returned.
3. If the caller is a federated user, `uin:federatedUserName` is returned.
members.name: UserId

members.document:
Account UIN.
1. If the caller is a Tencent Cloud account, the UIN of the current account is returned.
2. If the caller is a role, the UIN of the account that applies for the role is returned.
members.name: PrincipalId

members.document: Identity type.
members.name: Type

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The customizable name of the caller, consisting of letters
members.name: Name

members.document:
Policy description
Note:
1. The policy needs to be URL-encoded (if you request a TencentCloud API through the GET method, all parameters must be URL-encoded again in accordance with [Signature v3](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/598/33159?from_cn_redirect=1#1.-.E6.8B.BC.E6.8E.A5.E8.A7.84.E8.8C.83.E8.AF.B7.E6.B1.82.E4.B8.B2) before the request is sent).
2. For the policy syntax, please see CAM's [Syntax Logic](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/10603?from_cn_redirect=1).
3. The policy cannot contain the `principal` element.
members.name: Policy

members.document: The validity period of temporary credentials in seconds. Default value: 1,800s. Maximum value for a root account: 7,200s. Maximum value for a sub-account: 129,600s.
members.name: DurationSeconds

members.document: Temporary credentials
members.name: Credentials

members.document: Temporary credentials expiration time. A Unix timestamp will be returned which is accurate to the second
members.name: ExpiredTime

members.document:
Credentials expiration time in UTC time in ISO 8601 format.
Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Expiration

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Tag key. It’s up to 128 characters and case-sensitive.
members.name: Key

members.document: Tag value. It’s up to 256 characters and case-sensitive.
members.name: Value
